L      Saturation Point	    LSF of W(L,t)
128    5.8142006096757628   1.63372278*(t**0.312854767)    
256    7.8537394807026280   1.79007757*(t**0.276492864)     
512    10.985133777951857   1.87628531*(t**0.264659673) 
1024   14.991295093982066   1.69225395*(t**0.293390900)    
2048   20.727978220839987   1.66062856*(t**0.300386965)    
		
Avg. W(L,t) = 1.7306*(t**0.2896)

Therefore, Avg.Beta = 0.2896
